‚ÄúThe endangered species act is not being implemented in the way that promotes species recovery. We need to work with landowners to incentivize recovery.‚Äù - Dan Keppen #WesternWater

"In the short term, We recommend a fast-track response capability from the USDA and Interior that enables a localized response by farmers and ranchers. " - Dan Keppen #WesternWater

"There are critical parties in the Basin that could help make this happen, and Klamath Basin interests need support for this effort from the state and federal governments and our local communities. It can be done; it has been done elsewhere." - Dan Keppen #westernWater

"For long-term stability, a basin-wide settlement agreement is needed that would address water management for irrigation and fish and provide a fair and legal treatment of the Klamath Project irrigators and their families. " - Dan Keppen #WesternWater

"The American food consumer nationwide has access to fruits, vegetables, nuts, grains and beef throughout the year largely because of Western irrigated agriculture and the projects that provide water to these farmers and ranchers." - Dan Keppen #westernWater

"Ms Klein, is there something we should be doing with our laws so we take a more holistic approach to solving the issues facing our communities as their livelihoods dry up?" #westernwater
